title: 2023 Ford F250 STX Crew Cab 4X4
item_description:
2023 Ford F250 STX Crew Cab 4X4

This sale of this item is subject to the seller's confirmation

Specifications

  • Year: 2023
  • Make: Ford
  • Model: F250STX
  • VIN: 1FT8W2BN2PEC78918
  • License: ZEROEI2
    • Registration Expiration: 10/31/2025
    • Personalized Plate - seller may keep

Note: Certificate of Title and Transfer Form will be mailed once 1. the title has been released by the lien holder and 2. the title has been signed by the Seller. Please allow several weeks after the removal. Thank you for your patience. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of smog transfer fee, registration, transfer, sales tax, and fees due to the DMV.
